name: Cheese steak egg rolls
description: Asian style fried eggrolls stuffed with in-house smoked brisket and cheese. served with sweet chilli sauce￼

name: Artisan bread board
description: Pretzel, jallapenio cornbread and challa rolls with side of herbal butter. 2 of each

name: Spinach artichoke dip
description: Cream spinach (cream cheese and spinach) with pickled jallapenios and artichoke hearts topped with pico served  with tortilla chips and croustini

name: Kung Pao Shrimp & Calamari
description: lightly fried calamari, shrimp, jalapeño, bell pepper, bean sprouts

name: Texas Charcuterie Board
description: Bavarian pretzel topped with molten mozzarella, prosciutto (cured ham), beef bresaola (cured beef), jalapeño sausage, seasonal cheese, fruit, candy pecans, olives, cheese sauce, grain mustard

name: Deviled Egg Trio
description: 3 eggs cut in half (6 pieces) topped with bacon jam and garnished with chives

name: Wagyu Meatballs
description: 5 meatballs: ground beef breaded and lightly fried then toasted in the oven. Served in spicy tomato sauce, topped with mozzarella and accompanied with croustini
